channel.title: No HP bar nor Text above head
channel.description: So I was busy adding new Hitmarks with fading and shit. I think I ****ed something up bad... But I looked over my code and couldnt find anything which could result in this. So the problem is: When I hit no hp bars show up and when I try to say something my text only appear in chatbox not above my head? Anyone any ideas?
